title: Hard Lags, no Loss prevented
body:
Hey Community,

me and my mate were playing duoq and all of a sudden we got some frkin fkin hard lags. I couldn´t see Sivir´s q anymore (was my enemy adc) and
i couldn´t even last hit properly too because the minions didnt get any dmg from me.
The best thing about this was, that we didnt get a prevented loss for this bullshit.
So tell me, why does this still happen?
What is this fucking shit.

with no friendly regards
